name: SNEAKER (itch)
description:
SUMMARY

Play and finish your GameBoy game without your parents catching you, or falling asleep from sheer drowsiness.

CONTROLS

E - Toggle GameBoy

A/D - Move left/right

SPACE - Jump

ASSETS USED

VFX - SFXR

MUSIC - Abstraction - Three Red HEarts - Puzzle Pieces

TILEMAP - Monochrome Caves

ADDED/CHANGED IN v2.0

  • Added a main menu with instructions
  • Added visual indicator for the door opening
  • Added static and moving enemies in the platformer game
  • Polished the platformer visuals (player character + environment)
  • Changed the footsteps so that they increase in volume one by one
  • Added audio for the platformer (jumping, dying, winning)
